onyomiExamples.meaning: clothes (that one is wearing), wearing clothes
mysteries of one's master's art, robes and a bowl (monk's key possessions auctioned off at his funeral), transmission of the dharma from master to disciple (in Zen)
clothes (that one is wearing), wearing clothes
seasonal change of clothing, changing one's dress for the season, renovation, facelift, redesign, redecoration, new appearance, fresh look
